snippet: The White House chastised President Salva Kiir of South Sudan on Tuesday for refusing to sign a peace agreement to halt that nation’s civil war.
abstract: White House chastises South Sudan Pres Salva Kiir and threatens sanctions after he refuses to sign peace agreement to end country’s civil war.
lead_paragraph: The White House chastised President Salva Kiir of South Sudan on Tuesday for refusing to sign a peace agreement to halt that nation’s civil war.

headline.main: South Sudan: U.S. Threatens Sanctions Over Rejection of Pact
headline.print_headline: Africa; South Sudan: U.S. Threatens Sanctions Over Rejection of Pact
